SEARCH
Package com.instancesobp.utils

Class BatchOperations

java.lang.Object
com.instancesobp.utils.BatchOperations
public class BatchOperations extends Object
Utility class for performing operations on batches of orders. This class provides methods for batch manipulation, validation, and analysis.

      public static boolean equals(List<Order> orderList1, List<Order> orderList2)
      Compares two lists of orders to check if they are equal.
      Parameters:
      orderList1 - The first list of orders.
      orderList2 - The second list of orders.
      Returns:
      True if both lists contain the same orders, false otherwise.

    • canAddOrderToBatch

      public static boolean canAddOrderToBatch(Order order, Batch batch)
      Checks if an order can be added to a batch without exceeding the maximum weight limit.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to be added.
      batch - The batch to which the order will be added.
      Returns:
      True if the order can be added without exceeding the weight limit, false otherwise.

    • canAddOrdersInABatch

      public static boolean canAddOrdersInABatch(Order order1, Order order2, double maxWeight)
      Checks if two orders can be added together in a batch without exceeding the maximum weight limit.
      Parameters:
      order1 - The first order to be added.
      order2 - The second order to be added.
      maxWeight - The maximum weight allowed for the batch.
      Returns:
      True if the combined weight of the two orders does not exceed the maximum weight, false otherwise.

    • unionBatch

      public static Batch unionBatch(Batch batch1, Batch batch2) throws Exception
      Combines two batches into one, ensuring the combined weight does not exceed the maximum allowed weight.
      Parameters:
      batch1 - The first batch.
      batch2 - The second batch.
      Returns:
      A new batch containing all orders from both batches.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the combined weight exceeds the maximum allowed weight.

    • getListProductId

      public static List<Integer> getListProductId(Batch batch)
      Retrieves a list of unique product IDs from a batch.
      Parameters:
      batch - The batch to extract product IDs from.
      Returns:
      A list of unique product IDs.

      public static int numberOfDuplicateOrders(List<Batch> createdBatches) throws Exception
      Counts the number of duplicate orders across a list of batches.
      Parameters:
      createdBatches - The list of batches to analyze.
      Returns:
      The number of duplicate orders.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during processing.

    • numberOfOrders

      public static int numberOfOrders(List<Batch> batchList)

      Returns:
      The total number of orders.

    • validateSolution

      public static void validateSolution(Warehouse warehouse, List<Batch> batchList) throws Exception
      Validates a solution by checking the number of orders and ensuring no duplicate orders exist.
      Parameters:
      warehouse - The warehouse containing the original list of orders.
      batchList - The list of batches to validate.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the number of orders is incorrect or if duplicate orders are found.
